verbs.description: [ARG0: A rainy weekend in Washington , D.C.] [V: left] [ARG1: Donald Trump] [ARG2: with nothing to do but post tweets dripping with panic and desperation] . So he assumed his " Golden Throne " and began tapping out nine messages ...
